TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit AttributeTableValidationException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: Provides the functionality to throw an exception from the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder.ValidateTable%2A> method if the metadata provided in the table does not match properties, methods, and events on real types.
